function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low employee positivity rates from asymptomatic testing","Impact":"Underestimation of cases and potential spread in the workplace","Mitigation":"Combine testing with high-quality workplace infection control practices","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Employees, staff, workplace","Owner":"Workplace management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequacy of universal masking in reducing workplace transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace transmission","Mitigation":"Combine masking with physical barriers and environmental adjustments","Technologies":"Physical barriers, environmental adjustments","People":"Workers, employees","Owner":"Workplace management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variability in results from contact tracing interventions","Impact":"Inconsistent effectiveness of contact tracing in controlling workplace transmission","Mitigation":"Implement ongoing syndromic surveillance and outbreak investigations","Technologies":"Syndromic surveillance, outbreak investigations","People":"Contact tracers, workplace management","Owner":"Public health authorities, workplace management"}]}
